name: Opera Mini Saved Webpage
summary: Learn about .OBML16 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Opera Mini users can download webpages to view them without access to an Internet connection. When a user downloads a webpage, it is saved as an OBML16 file. OBML16 files use the OBML file format, which is a compact format designed to reduce the size (and increase the download speed) of web content.
NOTE: OBML16 files replaced .OBML15 files with the release of Opera Mini version 7.

description: An OBML16 file is a webpage saved using the Opera Mini mobile web browser. It is based on the Opera Binary Markup Language (OBML) and is a compact format for giving fast access to saved webpages. It replaced the OBML15 file format when Opera Mini version 7 was launched. All these variants of Opera Mini webpages were upgraded from the base OBML file format and each upgrade of Opera Mini is compatible with one OBML format only. OBML16 files can be converted to PDF and HTML online.
An OBML16 file is a webpage saved in the Opera Binary Markup Language (OBML) format. OBML16 files are created by and can be opened in Opera Mini, a web browser for mobile platforms.
